title: baristor
author: baristor
content: hi I need a 250 bucks loan am willing to repay 300 by friday.I am willing to provide proof of 8k$ profit trade I made recently / my id / wallet with 100$ nft as colletral. Ive been in this space since 2016 even tho some idiots make accusations they cant prove. I urgently requir this loan so any trusted member can provide Im sure youll be happy with this deal.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
